telegram.token__COMMENT__: The Telegram bot token (from the BotFather) goes here.
telegram.chat_id__COMMENT__: This chat id is where the bot uploads stickers before answering inline queries.
telegram.use_webhook__COMMENT__: When false, bot will polling using the /getUpdates API endpoint instead.

webhook.host__COMMENT__: Host of the bot (can be IP address)
webhook.internal_post__COMMENT__: Port to use for bot internal server. Webhook always uses 443 (route traffic using Nginx/Apache).

signgen.template_mask__COMMENT__: A mask of just the sign

geometry.font_sizes__COMMENT__: Font size according to # of lines of text
geometry.y_offset__COMMENT__: Vertical pixel offset according to # of lines of text
geometry.h_scale__COMMENT__: By what factor should the text be scaled horizontally?
geometry.rotation__COMMENT__: How many degrees should the text be rotated?
geometry.max_chars_per_line__COMMENT__: The maximum number of characters per line of text on signs before wrapping

colors.sign_bg__COMMENT__: RGBA background color of the sign
colors.text_stroke__COMMENT__: RGBA color of the text stroke
